name: HANOI – SAPA – FANSIPAN TREKKING 2days /2nights From Hanoi
description: Looking for active exploration of the beautiful North of Vietnam? You just found it! Conquer the Fansipan mountain, which with a height of 3143 meters is the highest in Indochina and visit the famous and colorful ricefields in Sapa in only small groups of max 6 people & our "Real Sapa Experience", together with your private local guide and porter(s) for the Fansipan trek.
